biography.bio: Stephanie Kellner was born on August 8, 1975 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress, known for Short Time Heroes (2015), Hatschipuh (1987) and Der zerbrochene Krug (2003).
biography.name: Stephanie Kellner

biography.bio: Michael Roll was born on April 29, 1961 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for Kommissarin Lucas (2003), Ein naheliegender Mord (1988) and Sieben Tage im Paradies (2001). He has been married to Antje Roll since 1987. They have three children.
biography.name: Michael Roll

biography.bio: Gunter Berger was born on August 25, 1943 in Boppard, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. He was an actor, known for Freunde fürs Leben (1992), Edgar Wallace - Das Schloss des Grauens (2002) and Edgar Wallace - Das Haus der toten Augen (2002). He died on May 13, 2015 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Gunter Berger

biography.bio: Christine Mayn was born on March 1, 1962 in Ritten, Bolzano, Italy. She is an actress, known for Stadtklinik (1993), Fieber: Ärzte für das Leben (1998) and Verkaufte Heimat - Teil 2 - Leb' wohl, du mein Südtirol (1989). She has been married to Nick Wilder since 1998.
biography.name: Christine Mayn

biography.bio: Born in Ndanda, Tanzania, Hugo very early developed a strong interest in the world of circus and entertainment. In addition to this, after he had his first appearance on stage in drama class, his passion for acting became more and more obvious. After working with disabled children for 11 months and high-school diploma, his acting studies at the prestigious "High School for Music and Performing Arts" in Stuttgart began. For about two years, followed-up on this he took over several parts on stage until his leading part in the television series "Wege zum Glück" turned out to be a mainstream success, which in addition enhanced his awareness at a larger audience. Subsequently he assumed a part in the prime-time Event-Movie "Sea of Death" as leading actor. From that point on he played numerous roles in German feature films and series. But also, again and again he was drawn to the stage, which is, in his own words, the origin of the profession. Hugo loves to dance. Given the fact that he's an avid fan of Michael Jackson, very early he started copying his dance moves. Hugo Grimm is a father of two. He and his family are living in Berlin.
biography.name: Hugo Grimm

biography.bio: Claudia Hübschmann was born on April 6, 1974 in Potsdam, German Democratic Republic. She is an actress, known for Toyland (2007), Liebe vergisst man nicht (2010) and Und weg bist du (2012).
biography.name: Claudia Hübschmann

biography.bio: Stuart Davidson was born on June 30, 1972 in Watford, Hertfordshire, England as Daniel Stuart Davidson. He is an actor, known for Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children (2016), The Mercy (2017), The Bad Education Movie (2015), Far from the Madding Crowd (2015), Capitaine Dent de Sabre le trésor de Lama Rama (2014) and Summer in February (2013). Over the years Stuart has appeared in a number of TV commercials for British television, and in 2013 he was cast as King Arthur in the documentary series "À la recherche du Hobbit" by Cerigo Films for ARTE TV. When not filming Stuart enjoys working as a self-employed Masseur under the name 'Stuart Davidson Massage'. Stuart is qualified in various therapies including Swedish Body Massage, Reflexology and Aromatherapy Massage.
biography.name: Stuart Davidson
